response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value not only financially but also in terms of its unique benefits and exclusivity. Given its significance, we propose a special introductory offer for you. We are offering the product to you at a price of $950,000. This represents a significant discount from its market value, making it an exceptional deal for someone with discerning taste like yourself. We believe this price reflects the true worth of the product while allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. We look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate this transaction soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Warm regards, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
